text: Hotaka Shrine is a Shinto shrine in Hotaka, Matsumoto, Nagano Prefecture, Japan. It is one of the three main shrines in Shinano Province. The Engishiki Jinmyocho describes it as a Myojin Taisha and it is now a Beppyo shrine. title: Hotaka Shrine
